comments:

error after creating at P4 server entry in the Client View of Perforce Depot
view. From the log:

It looks like the P4 plug-in is using a class that no longer exists in Eclipse
3.0. You will need to get an updated version of the P4 plug-in (it will likely
only work against the release of Eclipse it was designed to run on, since it is
using non-API internal classes here.  Moving to Team for further comment.

IRemoteResource was part of an interim API and was spec'd as such. It has been removed in 3.0. As John has mentioned, you will have to get a 3.0 compatible plug-in. /** * Note: This class/interface is part of an interim API that is still under * development and expected to change significantly before reaching stability. * It is being made available at this early stage to solicit feedback from pioneering * adopters on the understanding that any code that uses this API will almost * certainly be broken (repeatedly) as the API evolves.

This issue is being tracked on sourceforge as "[ 924737 ] p4eclipse doesn't 
work in eclipse 3.0 M8" Bugs item #924737, was opened at 2004-03-28 03:38
